path: books/Category Theory For Programmers/16. Yoneda Embedding/4

attr.a: I think it's just dual version of contravariant Yoneda embedding nothing more. If you know, please [contribute](https://github.com/ingun37/category-theory-for-programmers-answers).
attr.q: What is the application of the covariant Yoneda embedding to preorders? (Question suggested by Gershom Bazerman.)
